[Section: Page 575 of 1048]



I don’t want to fight. I just want my family safe. You are free to remove yourself and behave like your single, just as you did before you asked for a
separation (no further details required). But taking my kids and alienating me, feels abusive to them.
I hope you’ll reconsider the advice of professional child advocates instead of the internet advice you have chosen to identity with your position. The
last has the time with us as a family (10 meetings) and qualifications to provide personal advice.
But this is, without question, a reflection on your true ability to make child focused decisions in Max and Adrian’s best interests. And the alienation,
while I have 50/50 custody, has gone on for nine months now with me getting only a few days with them.
I think this is bad for Max and Adrian. Want to rethink?

mentally abusing our children as you work your way to the bottom of the barrel because no professional, child focused professional supports your
side. Opinion shop all you like, but it’s still ongoing mental abuse.
Your story and justification for child abuse has twisted and evolved since July. Booze, mushrooms (you did), DV, multiple accusations of monitoring
(8?). This is all while you maintain drop in functionality on me, and persist in sending me alerts on what’s happening on your network that I have
asked you to stop for months to falsely say I’m monitoring you. You won’t stop.
That is pretty much the totality of what happened unless you want to dig deeper on the incident that triggered your change of tune from the “Alyssa
model” to “Sherman’s March to the Sea”. So as you and your child focused attorney focus on a solution that stops the child abuse you continue to
justify I’m not confident in your ability to make sound decisions.
They say “3rd times the charm”, right? Well this will be the 7th time. And that’s if your higher wisdom is accepted as canon law with zero negotiation
back with a parent that has the same legal rights you have. May I suggest you pause your child abuse until you come down from the mount with the
stone tablets from god? Or google searches and your lawyer.
You realize this could never be a movie. People would walk out after the third try because the 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th, 8th, 9th would seem so abusive to the
kids and implausible in real life it would be a waste of time to sit through. Unfortunately our kids are not only sitting through it, they are living it. I
look forward to the explanation and education for why this is healthy.

would also want to go to. But either way it’s better than the Super Bowl for me and Adrian to see in person.
It’s not an emergency, but was certainly urgent. Once brackets drop, you don’t get another chance. We had the time of our life in Cabo watching
them win the national championship. A top memory we will share as a special father son moment for a lifetime.
Not sure when this kind of opportunity will ever happen again for us, but you viscously stole it. You did that to Adrian. You took something amazing
we share together away from him. No judge would ever say he should not have that lifetime experience.

without another excuse that you will tell me someday. Because I am already doing as you asked, but you are not even adhering to your own guidelines.

Just the dumb little stiff I’d come up up with at the beach or at our home. Cheap, goofy, immature things that would show you I care, and wanted to

berries, and sleep in her beautiful brown eyes ready not snuggle toes .
I lived to spoil you. To see your sleepy smile, and hear you “why are you always so sweet to me” . We grew apart of course, but we made a solum vow
that we agreed meant we would live a life with a glass half full till our lemonade overflowed again. Life’s full of peaks and valleys, our true character is
how we handle each.
I miss seeing you on my pedestal. Just like your name emblazoned on my body, no one else belongs there.

that you unilaterally blame me for what has transpired in our marriage does not make sense. They have also pointed out after speaking with you that
you were setting traps for me just to make a self fulfilling prophecy appear to be true.
We can opinion shop till we find the ones that we agree with or you and I can just choose to start this over and be friendly to each other I’ll point out
that you telling me to get help is the equivalent of what you asked me not to tell you to do so please don’t do that either. If you indeed have a therapist
that says only one person took party in this marriage of 25 years and relationship of 30 years. Please send them my way today. I will call them today.
I’d also point out that you don’t trust mental health professionals, opinions when they disagree with you. You only go with the ones that suit your
narrative. And then you read the Internet and turn to your lawyer for professional mental health advice.  So please quit doing that. I’m going to
reiterate again if you and I could have a couple minutes today just to chat we could start the day on a good foot. Please consider.

I did not say crazy.
I said the therapists we/I have spoken to over course of many years raised serious concerns regarding conduct and safety.
Me and kids are now engaged with therapists to address the impact on overall mental and emotional wellbeing, how to heal, and how to structure
future support to be safe.
In regards to Therapists that raised serious concerns. There was a variation of feedback strongly advising the need for legal police intervention.
How to structure plans moving forward is now being directly addressed to ensure complete safety.
Conversation with Kari after the meeting with Adrian was heartbreaking. What he communicated to her in an honest and open environment was
incredibly brave and I need to respect and frankly have no choice but to take action on his own expressed words. She made it clear to me if she believes
he is in, or put in an unsafe situation, she must take action. That is her obligation.
This is similar to the obligation Yurishka was put in. You have a different perspective, but professionals have a duty to act when they are made aware
of certain situations.
AnnaLisa will be talking to Lisa. How we move forward will be dependent on how you receive the information and what you believe will be in best
interest of boys. We will see.
